TargetComponent.name: ID
TargetComponent.desc: Index difficulty of the trial, in bits, it is used to compute specific values for all targets/markers

TargetComponent.name: VDist
TargetComponent.desc: Distance between origin and bottom rectangles centroids (cm)

TargetComponent.name: Colour
TargetComponent.desc: Target colour in the format RRRGGGBBB eg: 000000000 = Black, 255255255 = White

TargetComponent.name: MarkDist
TargetComponent.desc: Horizontal distance between target centroid and marker (cm)

TargetComponent.name: MarkColour
TargetComponent.desc: Markers colour in the format RRRGGGBBB eg: 000000000 = Black, 255255255 = White

TLComponent.name: PreOscDelay
TLComponent.desc: Delay between subjects reaching targets and markers disappearance (ms)

TLComponent.name: FeedbackScaling
TLComponent.desc: Scaling factor for the feedback transformation
